kenekge aayusha pramanaya ilakkamen niwaradiwa kimata kramayak mama nam thawama igena gena naha.ehema kramayak thiyenawanam mama serama wada nawaththala balanne mata thiyena aayusha pramanaya.boho jyothishawedin keneku thamange aayusha gana asu wita thamange nodanna bawa penwimata athi nokamaththa nisama katata ena dewal kiyanawa.alpayusha yoga gana poth pathwala sadahanwa athath kendra balannan eewa gana sadahan karanne manusha ayurin.habayi kawuru hari ee gana thadin asuwoth sasthranukulawa pilithuru denawa.oyage kendraye alpayusha yoga natha.(mama meya pawasuwe sathyalesamaya.)

2018 aprel 29 wanida wesak poho dinaya lesa prakasha kara athi athiwishesha gasat niwedanaya niwaradi bawa prawina jyethishawedi aacharya piyasena rathuwithana mahatha pawasayi. 2018 aprel 29 wanida purwa bhaga 6.37 ta wesak pohoya laba 30 wanida ude 6.28 gewi yana bawada sil samadan wima 29 wani irida bawada ohu sandahan karayi.
